Arguably doing so detracts more from keeping the town under control whilst she presumably thought she'd have no trouble defeating this guy.

Consider the massive CG upgrading her guild has done for her CA and that they're going toe to toe. She probably didn't expect to be held back like this.

Incidentally, that would in turn heavily suggest that Anamax has gotten his hands on a damn lot of CGs too one way or another.
